_description: Create smooth transitions between two different frames
_usage: Generate video that transitions from start image to end image

first_frame.description: City skyline at golden hour, warm sunset colors

last_frame.description: Same city skyline at night, lights on, stars visible

transition.description: Sun sets, colors shift from warm to cool, city lights turn on

action.primary: time passes from sunset to night
action.secondary: building lights activate progressively, stars emerge

scene.maintain: City layout, building positions, camera angle

style.color_grade: Warm sunset transitioning to cool night with warm city lights

audio.ambience: Ambience: city transitioning from day to night sounds

first_frame.description: Tree in full summer green leaves, bright sunny day

last_frame.description: Same tree with autumn red/orange leaves, overcast sky

transition.description: Leaves transition from green to autumn colors

action.secondary: sky shifts from bright to overcast, some leaves fall

style.color_grade: Vibrant greens transitioning to warm autumn palette

audio.sfx: SFX: leaves rustling, occasional leaf falling
audio.music: Music: gentle orchestral, passage of time feel

first_frame.description: Young woman in 20s, bright eyes, smooth skin, casual clothes

last_frame.description: Same woman aged to 60s, gray hair, wrinkles, wisdom in eyes, same pose

transition.description: Face ages naturally over decades, hair grays, wrinkles form

action.primary: ages gracefully from youth to elderly
action.secondary: hair color changes, subtle expression shifts

scene.maintain: Pose, background, clothing style, camera angle
scene.change: Age, skin texture, hair color, subtle expression

audio.music: Music: emotional piano, passage of time, bittersweet

first_frame.description: Red sports car on showroom floor, studio lighting

last_frame.description: Same car but in blue color, identical position and lighting

transition.description: Car color smoothly transitions from red through purple to blue

action.primary: color morphs from red to blue
action.secondary: light plays across surface during transition

scene.maintain: Car shape, position, studio setup, lighting

first_frame.description: Pencil sketch of architectural building, line drawing

last_frame.description: Photorealistic render of same building, full detail

transition.description: Sketch fills in with color, detail, and realism progressively

action.primary: transforms from sketch to photorealistic render
action.secondary: colors fill in, textures appear, lighting develops

scene.change: Visual style from line art to photorealism

style.color_grade: Black and white to full color

audio.sfx: SFX: pencil drawing sounds transitioning to ambient environment

image_preparation: Both images should have identical composition/framing
Same aspect ratio for both images
Similar lighting setup for smooth transitions
Subject should be in same position in both frames
transition_types: State change (empty to full, clean to messy)
prompt_writing: Specify what changes and what stays the same
Avoid requesting additional elements not in frames
limitations: Cannot use with reference images (Ingredients mode)
Complex scene changes may cause artifacts
